hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE" | grep -qE '.py$'; then uv run ruff check "$CLAUDE_FILE" --fix 2>&1 | head -10; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE" | grep -qE '.py$'; then uv run ty check src/ 2>&1 | head -10; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE" | grep -qE 'src/multilog/.*\.py$'; then uv run python test_logger.py 2>&1 | tail -20; fi
